Name: Verify Creation of Umrah Package from Home Page
Description: Navigate to the Umrah operators home page and create a new package. Select the required details and complete the package creation. Verify that the package is successfully created.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to https://bsp-nusuk.haj.gov.sa
step 2: Click on button '\u0645\u0648\u0627\u0641\u0642' -> Navigate to page 'UmrahOperators/Home/CreatePackage/*'
step 3: Click on input field 'Search ArrivalFlightDate'
step 4: Click on th
step 5: Click on td
step 6: Click on input field 'select-arrival-flight'
step 7: Click on button '\u0627\u0644\u062e\u0637\u0648\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u0627\u0644\u064a\u0629'
step 8: Click on input field 'Search DepartureFlightDate'
step 9: Click on th
step 10: Click on td  -> Navigate to page 'UmrahOperators/Home/SubmittedGroups'
step 11: Click on button 'OK'
step 12: Click on link 'qa-actions'
step 13: Click on link 'qa-submit-umrah'
step 14: Click on button 'OK'
step 15: Click on button 'OK' -> Navigate to page 'UmrahOperators/Home/CreatePackage/*'
step 16: Click on span
step 17: Click on button '\u0627\u0644\u062e\u0637\u0648\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u0627\u0644\u064a\u0629'
step 18: Click on button '\u0645\u0648\u0627\u0641\u0642' -> Navigate to page 'UmrahOperators/Home/SubmittedGroups'
step 19: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Verify Create Package in Umrah Operators Home
Description: Navigate to the create package page in the Umrah operators home. Perform multiple actions such as checking out, attaching documents, and inputting transportation details. Verify the create package page.

step 1: Navigate to https://bsp-nusuk.haj.gov.sa
step 2: Click on input field 'None GDS CheckOut'
step 3: Click on td
step 4: Click on input field 'None GDS Hotel Attachment'
step 5: Click on span
step 6: Click on button '\u0627\u0644\u062e\u0637\u0648\u0629 \u0627\u0644\u062a\u0627\u0644\u064a\u0629'
step 7: Click on input field 'None GDS Transportation BRN'
step 8: Enter input value in input field 'None GDS Transportation BRN'
step 9: Click on span 'select2-None GDS Transportation Company-container'
step 10: Click on span
step 11: Click on input field
step 12: Enter input value in input field
step 13: Enter input value in input field 'None GDS TransPurchasingPrice'
step 14: Click on input field 'None GDS Transportation Date'
step 15: Click on td
step 16: Click on input field 'None GDS Trans Attachment' -> Navigate to page 'UmrahOperators/Home/SubmittedGroups'
step 17: Click on button ' \u0645\u0633\u062d \u0627\u0644\u062a\u0635\u0641\u064a\u0629' -> Navigate to page 'UmrahOperators/Home/CreatePackage/*'
